entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 14 April 2023
